resources.string: "*** PRETEND THAT THE IMAGES ABOVE ARE VARIOUS UNIQUE IMAGES OF THE SAME HOME *** \n \n " "Filler real-estate text: This desirable 3 bedroom brick bungalow in a quiet neighbourhood is located steps from excellent schools, major highway and all amenities. " "With its large, bright living room, spacious master bedroom and two additional main floor bedrooms, it may just be perfect for your family. "

"And having a second kitchen, large family room and 2nd full bathroom in the basement could make it even more desirable for when the grandparents come to visit, or for the teenage kids. " "Relax on summer days on your large deck with pergola overlooking your private, fenced in backyard. The detached single car garage makes for a great work shop and with a driveway capable of holding up to 4 cars, theres plenty of room for parking for the whole family. " "Make this home your dream home. A must see! Steps from Brock University Bus Stop."
